name: BugTracker
longDesc: The BugTracker is a work in progress. It's modeled off of JIRA or Azure DevOps as a way for teams to track incoming issues, assign them priorities, manage team members assigned, and track progress.

name: Todoist Clone
shortDesc: Recreate the impressive functionality of Todoist
longDesc: The Todoist clone is a work in progress. It was originally built as a practice project in Code Sandbox, but grew into something significant that I wanted to continue working on.
